scripts.clean:shared: yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-types clean && yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-utils clean && yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-validation clean && rm -f libs/*/*.tsbuildinfo
scripts.build:shared: yarn clean:shared && yarn build:shared-types && yarn build:shared-utils && yarn build:shared-validation
scripts.build:all: yarn build:shared && yarn workspace frontend build && yarn workspace nodejs-service build
scripts.dev:shared: yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-types dev & yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-utils dev & yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-validation dev
